name: jumpcloud-ui-assignment
description: Front end code for JumpCloud's UI Assmentment Project
author: JumpCloud and Mike DiLorenzo

scripts.build-js: npm run lint & browserify --debug public/js/app.js -o public/build/app.js
scripts.autoprefix: postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 1%, last 2 versions, last 5 Android versions' -r public/build/main.css
scripts.watch-sass: nodemon --no-notify-update -e scss -w public/sass -x 'npm run build-sass & npm run autoprefix'
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-sass & npm run autoprefix & node server.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-sass & node server.js
